mapper.select: SELECT qna_seq, qna_title, qna_contents, qna_cnt, file_nm, file_loc, file_size, enr_user, upd_user, SUBSTRING_INDEX( upd_date, ' ', 1) upd_date, SUBSTRING_INDEX( enr_date, ' ', 1) enr_date FROM tb_qna WHERE qna_seq = #{qna_seq}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS tot_cnt FROM tb_qna
${searchkey} like '%${searchword}%'
mapper.update: update tb_qna set qna_cnt = qna_cnt+1 where qna_seq = #{qna_seq}
mapper.select: select qna_seq, rpy_seq,no, rpy_lvl, rpy_contents, enr_user, enr_date, upd_user, upd_date from tb_qna_reply where qna_seq=#{qna_seq} group by qna_seq, rpy_seq,no
mapper.insert: insert into tb_qna_reply ( qna_seq,rpy_seq,no,rpy_lvl,rpy_contents, enr_user,enr_date,upd_user,upd_date )SELECT #{qna_seq} ,COALESCE(MAX(rpy_seq)+1,1) ,COALESCE(MAX(no)+1,1) ,#{rpy_lvl} ,#{rpy_contents} ,#{enr_user} ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%c-%d %T' ) ,#{upd_user} ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%c-%d %T' ) FROM tb_qna_reply;

insert into tb_qna_reply ( qna_seq,rpy_seq,no,rpy_lvl,rpy_contents, enr_user,enr_date,upd_user,upd_date )SELECT #{qna_seq} ,#{rpy_seq} ,COALESCE(MAX(no)+1,1) ,#{rpy_lvl} ,LTRIM(replace(#{rpy_contents},subSTring_index(#{rpy_contents},' ',1),'')) ,#{enr_user} ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%c-%d %T' ) ,#{upd_user} ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%c-%d %T' ) FROM tb_qna_reply;
